title.en: Prayer to His Holiness the Dalai Lama

text.en: You are both Avalokiteśvara, the embodiment of all the buddhas’ compassion,
And Padmākara, the one who is unobstructed in powerful enlightened action,
text.en-trans: tokmé trinlé tsal dzé pema jung

text.en: Protector of the teachings and beings in the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: chik dü ngowo gangchen ten drö gön
tendzin gyatso zhab la solwa deb
